title: [Health] Study finds significant association between tonic immobility and PTSD symptom severity. Tonic immobility refers to an involuntary response that causes motor inhibition, vocal suppression, and analgesia. It's elicited by extreme fear and perception of entrapment in a life-threatening situation.
[Health] saRNA vaccine expressing membrane-anchored RBD elicits broad and durable immunity against SARS-CoV-2 variants of concern
